page.title: 06SHILDON SCOUTS GROUP
page.content: I am a pupil at{All Saints' School}in Shildon, and I go to the{Scouts}every Tuesday evening from 7pm.to 9pm. It is held in the school dining hall.Our Group was started in 1982. We have a tuck shop before we go into the horseshoe. There are 4 different kinds of patrols. Mine is called Swan. The others are called Hawk, Kestrels and Eagles.During the weekend of 5th of September to camp at{Muggleswick}on the moors in Weardale.The cost will be Â£5.You have to take your own food and drinks.Each evening when we go to the Scout meetings we play rounders or other team games.We learn skills and crafts for our badges.Our Scout leader is called Mrs.Rowley and her helper is called Joanne.I am busy with my collector's badge at the moment. I am collecting all of the different kinds of erasers.
